.. Getting Started
.. ===============

.. This tutorial provides a starting point for getting acquainted with NeuroDOT_Py.
.. You can download the notebook from the `NeuroDOT_Py GitHub. <https://github.com/WUSTL-ORL/NeuroDOT_py>`_
